name: ABOVE THE CLOUDS - 2
description:
HEAVY MONOLITHS FLOATING BETWEEN VOID AND SPACE, MATTER AND DISTANCE, FROM HORIZON TO HORIZON.
THOSE UNSPEAKABLE AND INTOUCHABLE LIMITS BEYOND EVERYTHING AND NOTHING.
JUST BEING HERE IS CORRUPTING THE EMPTINESS, DISTURBING NON-ORDER, BE THE PRIVILEGED WITNESS OF DEAD CALM.
AN UNSTABLE CALM THAT MAY SHATTER.

THE HORIZON, THE WHIMSICAL OFF-FIELD OF HOPES.
BEYOND AND AFTER. BY THE SIMPLE IMPULSE TO SEE FURTHER, HIGHER, BEHIND.    
REJECTING THE OUTLOOK, DRIVEN BY THE NEED TO LIVE AT ALL COST IN MOVEMENT. 
NOT LETTING TIME CRUSHING US WITH THIS SHRINKING WORLD.

A BULKY AND MENACING FIGURE, AN OPPRESSOR ABOVE ALL.
SO HEAVY THAT IT SEEMS UNBEARABLE, READY TO COLLAPSE.                          
FROM BENEATH, THE AIR STAY PLACID. SUSPENDED BETWEEN TWO VIBRATIONS.
THE CASTED AUTHORITY LIKE A SHADOW THAT FALLS OVER EVERYTHING THAT STRUGGLES TO LIVE UNDER. AN OMEN WHOSE FACE WE NEVER SEE ILLUMINATED.
